plot: Scene from an electric launch on the Grand Canal in "Venice in America," Pan-American Exposition. A panorama of unusual beauty and of greatly diversified scenery.
title: The Bridge of Sighs -- Pan-American Exposition
plot_es: Scene from an electric launch on the Grand Canal in "Venice in America," Pan-American Exposition. A panorama of unusual beauty and of greatly diversified scenery.
original_name: The Bridge of Sighs -- Pan-American Exposition
